name: 東亞音樂與現代性
comment: 上課地點：師大路31號2樓(民音所教室)
goals: 了解東亞音樂文化與現況分析
思考東亞音樂與文化之分析方法
思考東亞與現代音樂探索與展演能力
syllabus: Week 1 —Introduction Concepts of modernity Music as culture —Understanding East Asia from world perspectives —Musicology Lecture by Lam Week 2 — China 1: Overview, “National Music” — China 2: Republican Shanghai as Site of Modernity, Middle Class Struggle —DUE: Musicology lecture report Week 3 — China 3: Operas —China 4: Music and Ideology Brief Summary 1: Modern songs — DUE: Final project proposal — Kunqu performance at the University of Michigan, Ann Arbor (public event of the musicology course “Kunqu, the Classical Opera of Globalized China,” by Prof. Joseph Lam)\*can we make a trip to attend the event? Week 4 — Listening Quiz 1 China 5: Musical Interfaces between East and West —China 5 (con’t) (China 6 Chinese Music Beyond China) Brief Summary 2 —Review & Reflection: China and the world Week 5 —Japan 1: Overview, Westward and Eastward —Japan 2: Theatrical Arts(get ready for mid term exam!) —Red Chamber Concert Week 6 —Mid term Exam Week 7 —Japan Film Discussion Week 8 —Japan 3: Inward and Across —Japan 4: International Interface Week 9 —Brief Summary 3 (at least one reports on Taiko) Review and Reflection: Japan Week 10 —DUE: Performance report — Listening Quiz 2 Korea 1: Overview Week 11 — Korea 2: Folk and Pop Brief Summary 4 Week 12 — Korea 3: Pansori Week 13 —Korea 4: Ancient and Contemporary Week 14 — Korea film discussion Week 15 —Review & Reflection: Korea (and East Asia) Week 16~17 — Final Project write-up Week 18 Final project submission

grading.note: 1) oral report on assigned readings. 2) comment on assigned class report. 3) discussion. 4) oral report on mid-term and final project plans. 5) any other class works to be assigned

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
